kickanyone.name: Kick Anyone
kickanyone.desc: Kicks anyone of your same rank from the room

basicavatar.name: Basic Avatar
basicavatar.desc: Combines a trainer with a pokemon.

simplerecolor.name: Simple Recolor
simplerecolor.desc: Recolor a pokemon or trainer as part of your sprite.

recolorsplash.name: Recolor Splash
recolorsplash.desc: Recolor any part of your basic avatar

singleanimation.name: Single Animation
singleanimation.desc: Combine an animated avatar with a non-animated one.

doubleanimation.name: Double Animation
doubleanimation.desc: Makes an avatar with 2 animated sprites.

userlisticon.name: Userlist Icon
userlisticon.desc: Makes a userlist icon with maximum 6 pokemons.

roomintro.name: roomintro
roomintro.desc: Makes a roomintro for your room.

givesbuckback.name: Gives buck back
givesbuckback.desc: Gives the bucks you lost in last gamble. Max(15)

monopoke.name: Monopoke
monopoke.desc: Creates a monopoke tour with the poke you choose.
